key.name: vertical-padding
key.summary: How many pixels to use for padding above and below the workspace name border.

key.name: horizontal-padding
key.summary: How many pixels to use for padding left and right of the workspace name border.

key.name: use-name
key.summary: Whether to use workspace names instead of numbers.

key.name: use-fixed-width
key.summary: Whether to use a fixed width in pixels to display the panel button.

key.name: fixed-width
key.summary: How many pixels to use as a fixed width for the panel button.

key.name: index
key.summary: The index used to place the panel button within the chosen position.

key.name: position
key.summary: Represents the position to place the panel button in, -1, 0, and 1 for left, center, and right respectively.

key.name: border-colour
key.summary: Hex colour used for the border.

key.name: fill-colour
key.summary: Hex colour used for the background.

key.name: text-colour
key.summary: Hex colour used for the text.

key.name: use-text-default
key.summary: Whether to use the default text colour.

key.name: use-border-default
key.summary: Whether to use the default border colour.

key.name: use-fill-default
key.summary: Whether to use the default background colour.

key.name: workspace-thumbnails
key.summary: Whether to display workspace thumbnails in the button menu.
